Jeffery Reeves had an interesting argument in his Oct PERIOD  letter  The pamphlet he received is certainly disturbing and ignorant but so are his views on Catholicism and the Church PERIOD

To call a 2000yearold religion which has so greatly influenced Western culture a  is absolutely intolerable PERIOD

Mr PERIOD Reeves wants to  by observing history PERIOD Heres a little history lesson for you Jeffery Thanks to the Catholic Church great works of literature from ancient Greece and Rome are still around today PERIOD The Catholic Church and Charlemagne were responsible for incredible advancements in culture and lifestyle during the Carolingian period PERIOD

He talks about  in the Church PERIOD I guess he never read about any of the Catholic missionaries who traveled to Third World countries risking their personal health and safety to alleviate the poverty and suffering PERIOD

If you want to blame someone for the horrific abuses of children blame the individuals who perpetrated them PERIOD Its unfair to blame an entire group for the crimes committed by a few people PERIOD

Every educated person knows that theres a huge difference between a homosexual and a pedophile PERIOD Im Catholic and I know it PERIOD

Dont assume that all Catholics are narrowminded gay bashers PERIOD Most Christians I know believe in tolerance PERIOD

Reeves is outraged that a church pamphlet would criticize people who arent heterosexual PERIOD Im outraged that a fellow Penn State student whos speaking about a lack of tolerance would criticize all Catholics PERIOD
